activityTitle: Shape Stories: From Abstract to Recognisable

feedbackSections.title: Originality of Ideas
feedbackSections.details: The human figure is creative and unique, demonstrating imaginative thinking. The house, balloon, and computer are recognizable but follow conventional ideas.

feedbackSections.title: Diversity of Ideas
feedbackSections.details: The sketches show a mix of categories (person, building, object, technology), reflecting decent variety.

feedbackSections.title: Clarity of Sketches
feedbackSections.details: The sketches need more precision and clarity to improve overall quality.

feedbackSections.title: Title Creativity
feedbackSections.details: Titles are direct and descriptive but lack imaginative flair (e.g., 'Balloon' and 'Computer').

text: Refine Complex Shapes - Pay extra attention to more intricate sketches, such as the house, to ensure the lines match the template while maintaining proportional balance.
Enhance Title Creativity - While the titles accurately reflect the drawings, encourage the use of more imaginative, playful, or descriptive titles.
Experiment with Diverse Concepts - Push for more unique object transformations that break away from common ideas.
Focus on Precision - Practice cleaner lines and smoother transitions between template shapes and finished sketches.
